item.title: CVE-2024-31387|2024-06-04T17:36:35.859Z -- popup%20likebox%20team -- popup%20like%20box
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Popup LikeBox Team Popup Like box allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Popup Like box: from n/a through 3.7.2.
